name: OH Partners
description:
OH Partners is a many-headed monster, genetically engineered for your brand to ride into battle. Fueled by a passion to create work that works, like, really works, our staff of full-time wizards and wonks make magic over the airwaves and in the ledger for a variety of client partners.
Our experts in the fields of creative, strategy, PR, media, improve, and ping pong, all take an honest approach to help the brands we represent tell their very best story to move the hearts and minds of their consumers.
READ MORE...
